author: parithosh
content: Added MEV to a lot more nodes: http://mev-relay-1.dencun-devnet-12.ethpandaops.io:9060/

author: tersec
content: is there a list of which nodes are running MEV now?

author: tersec
content: Agree, am tracking the feasibility of eventually removing `produceBlindedBlock` (deprecated), and so far at least a couple of VCs don't support `produceBlockV3` and/or need a special flag. Whether one chooses to remove it ultimately or not, it seems like a useful goal to be able to do so without breaking the ecosystem: https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/pull/5644

author: barnabasbusa
